org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Class BinaryTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.BinaryTree

  • public class BinaryTree
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a binary tree. Used to find files in the Zipf distribution.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4
    Author:
    ruben
